to get us going with this next release of jasper.
to get the story... and please provide feedback if you have any interest

author: pierred
msg: REGEXP_HOME was not reset to its original value.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make all of the relative references absolute by basing them on the value of
${basedir}, which is expanded (by Ant) to the absolute pathname of the base
directory for this build.  In this way, the properties that are passed to
nested Ant executions in subdirectories are still correct.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the directory to which the source code is copied.

author: craigmcc
msg: Refine "dist" commands to include all of the appropriate Javadoc, and the
Tomcat 4.0 source code, in the binary distribution.
